name: TITAN VALLEY EXPEDITION
subtitle: Explore the Valley of Giants

vehicle.name: Gyrosphere
vehicle.description: Self-driving glass sphere ‚Äî roam freely among the largest dinosaurs ever

description: Journey through the 'Heart of Isla Nublar'. Guests travel freely among the most colossal dinosaurs in Earth's history. Feel the ground tremble beneath your feet.

specimensIncluded.highlight: Close Encounter ‚Äî approach within meters
Observe communal feeding grounds

warningMessage: You are registering for the Titan Valley Expedition. This package includes access to the Central Grasslands zone.

name: AMBER CANOPY ASCENT
subtitle: Conquer the Amber Sky Dome

vehicle.name: Aerial Gondola
vehicle.description: Armored cable car ‚Äî glide through mist and observe aerial predators

description: Take an elevator 300m up to enter the glass-enclosed Aviary. Walk across suspended bridges through the mist and observe the sky predators right beside you.

specimensIncluded.highlight: Observe them perching on cliff faces
Species gliding and soaring all around
Lagoon sighting from above (Bonus View)

warningMessage: WARNING: You are requesting access to the Aviary Sector. A signed liability waiver is required before ascent.

name: APEX PREDATOR VIP NIGHT TOUR
subtitle: Night Tour: The Apex Predator

vehicle.name: Armored Mobile Cage
vehicle.description: Steel-armored cage vehicle ‚Äî observe T-Rex at lethal proximity

description: A trip reserved for the bravest. Enter 'Zone 9' after sunset to witness T-Rex feeding time. Absolute silence is required. Any noise disturbance may provoke the subject.

specimensIncluded.highlight: Witness the hunt & nighttime feeding
Compy swarm cleaning up leftovers ‚Äî deeply unsettling
Fire simulated flares to lure T-Rex (Interactive)

warningMessage: MAXIMUM THREAT LEVEL: You must sign a Life Liability Waiver to join this tour. InGen Corporation disclaims all responsibility once you enter Zone 9.

name: CRETACEOUS SAFARI: THE HORNED GIANTS
subtitle: Cretaceous Safari: The Horned Giants

vehicle.name: Open-Top Cruiser
vehicle.description: Open-roof Jeep ‚Äî breathe the primeval forest air and approach herbivores

description: Drive through dense primeval forest to locate Triceratops nesting grounds. A rare opportunity to witness their defensive formation against predators.

specimensIncluded.highlight: Close approach ‚Äî hand-feeding permitted
Long-crested species that warns of danger with trumpet calls
Hatchling zone & nesting grounds viewing

warningMessage: Family-friendly tour! High-safety zone. Guests are permitted close approach and hand-feeding of Triceratops under InGen staff supervision.

name: COASTAL CLIFFS SKY-TRAM
subtitle: The Coastal Cliffs Sky-Tram

vehicle.name: Suspended Gondola 360¬∞
vehicle.description: 360-degree suspended cabin ‚Äî hovering between the abyss and the ocean

description: Hang suspended between cliff edges and the open ocean. Watch Pteranodon dive from mountaintops into the water at 100km/h to hunt prey. Experience what it feels like to be 'prey' in mid-air.

specimensIncluded.highlight: Spectacular cliff-dive fishing from the rock face
Shadows of ancient sea monsters beneath the surface
Spot cliff-side nests through specialized binoculars

warningMessage: Cabin sway warning: High wind speeds may cause cabin oscillation. Guests with acrophobia should carefully consider. Hold the handrails at all times.

name: PRIMEVAL RIVER EXPEDITION
subtitle: Exploring the Primeval River

vehicle.name: Armored Hydrofoil
vehicle.description: Armored hovercraft ‚Äî gliding over foggy swamp waters

description: Travel upstream into the dense fog-shrouded swamplands. Spinosaurus doesn't just hunt on land ‚Äî it attacks from beneath the water. Keep all limbs inside the vessel at all times.

specimensIncluded.highlight: The moment its massive dorsal sail breaks the surface
Smaller fish-eating dinosaur along the riverbank
Boar croc lurking in the reeds ‚Äî extremely aggressive

warningMessage: MAXIMUM DANGER: Spinosaurus is a semi-aquatic creature capable of attacking from underwater. Keep all limbs inside the vessel at all times. Do not touch the water surface. InGen disclaims all liability if guests violate regulations.

name: THE ABYSSAL GRACE VOYAGE
subtitle: Journey Into the Abyss

vehicle.name: Titan-Glass Submarine
vehicle.description: Reinforced glass submarine ‚Äî 360-degree underwater panoramic view

description: Descend 50m into underwater caverns beneath the island. Plesiosaurus is a curious species that often swims close to the submarine to interact. A visually stunning experience with bioluminescent coral and ancient fish species.

specimensIncluded.highlight: Graceful pod swimming ‚Äî performing underwater 'flight'
Giant nautilus species drifting all around
Glowing caves ‚Äî breathtaking visual effects

warningMessage: Safe aquatic experience. Cabin pressure remains stable at all times. Guests may relax and enjoy the stunning deep-sea scenery. Note: do not tap on the glass when Plesiosaurus approaches.

name: THE LEVIATHAN FEEDING FRENZY
subtitle: The Leviathan's Fury

vehicle.name: Submersible Observatory
vehicle.description: Semi-submerged observation platform ‚Äî rapid retraction in emergencies

description: VIP seating at the 'Splash Zone'. Witness a 13,000 PSI bite force as Mosasaurus launches from the water to devour live bait (Great White Shark). Warning: You WILL get soaked. Emergency barrier systems are on standby.

specimensIncluded.highlight: The iconic feeding lunge ‚Äî 13,000 PSI bite force
Live bait ‚Äî poor thing
Surprise guest ‚Äî occasionally spotted in distant waters

warningMessage: SPLASH ZONE WARNING: You WILL be completely soaked. Electronic devices may be damaged. InGen provides free waterproof bags but accepts NO liability for any damages. Bite force 13,000 PSI ‚Äî maintain safe distance.
